trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Tillhandahåller data för den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag"> </xref> händelse.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> event occurs during a drag-and-drop operation and allows the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag>händelse inträffar under dra och släppa och kan dra källan för att avgöra om dra och släpp ska avbrytas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag>

trans-unit.source: A QueryContinueDragEventArgs specifies whether and how the drag-and-drop operation should proceed, whether any modifier keys are pressed, and whether the user has pressed the ESC key.
trans-unit.target: En QueryContinueDragEventArgs anger om och hur dra och släppa ska fortsätta om alla modifieraren trycks ned och om användaren har tryckt på ESC.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> event sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction?displayProperty=fullName> if the ESC key was pressed and sets `Action` to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction?displayProperty=fullName> if the left, middle, or right mouse button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: Som standard den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag>händelse anger <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>till <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction?displayProperty=fullName>om på ESC var trycks ned och anger `Action` till <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction?displayProperty=fullName>om vänster, mitten eller höger musknapp trycks.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag>

trans-unit.source: For information about the event model, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Information om händelsemodellen finns [händelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: The current state of the SHIFT, CTRL, and ALT keys.
trans-unit.target: SKIFT, CTRL och ALT för aktuella tillstånd.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the ESC key was pressed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om har tryckt på ESC; Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragAction"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragAction"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the status of a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger status för dra och släppa.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> event sets Action to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction?displayProperty=fullName> if the ESC key was pressed and sets `Action` to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction?displayProperty=fullName> if the left, middle, or right mouse button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: Som standard den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag>händelse anger åtgärden till <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction?displayProperty=fullName>om på ESC var trycks ned och anger `Action` till <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction?displayProperty=fullName>om vänster, mitten eller höger musknapp trycks.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragAction"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragAction"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: Gets whether the user pressed the ESC key.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar om användaren trycker på ESC.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> event sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction?displayProperty=fullName> if EscapePressed is true.
trans-unit.target: Som standard den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag>händelse anger <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>till <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction?displayProperty=fullName>om EscapePressed är true.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the ESC key was pressed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om har tryckt på ESC; Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current state of the SHIFT, CTRL, and ALT keys.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar det aktuella tillståndet för Skift, CTRL och ALT-tangenterna.

trans-unit.source: The bits that are set in the KeyState property identify the keys or mouse buttons that were pressed during the operation.
trans-unit.target: Bitar som anges i egenskapen KeyState identifiera nycklar eller musknapp har trycks ned under åtgärden.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the left mouse button is pressed, the first bit in the KeyState property is set.
trans-unit.target: Om vänster musknapp trycks ned, ange den första biten i egenskapen KeyState.

trans-unit.source: You can use the bitwise `AND` operator to test for a given key state.
trans-unit.target: Du kan använda den bitvis `AND` operatorn för att testa för en viss nyckel tillstånd.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the bits that are set for a specified event.
trans-unit.target: I följande tabell visas bitar som har angetts för en viss händelse.

trans-unit.source: |Bit|Key| |---------|---------| |1|The left mouse button.| |2|The right mouse button.| |4|The SHIFT key.| |8|The CTL key.| |16|The middle mouse button.| |32|The ALT key.| By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> event sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction?displayProperty=fullName> if KeyState indicates that the left, middle, or right mouse button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: | Bit | Nyckel | |---------|---------| |&1; | Vänster musknapp. | |&2; | Höger musknapp. | |&4; | SKIFT-tangenten. | |&8; | CTL-nyckel. | |&16; | Den mittersta musknappen. | |&32; | ALT-tangenten. | Som standard den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag>händelse anger <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>till <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction?displayProperty=fullName>om KeyState indikerar att vänster, mitten eller höger musknapp trycks.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag>

trans-unit.source: The current state of the SHIFT, CTRL, and ALT keys.
trans-unit.target: SKIFT, CTRL och ALT för aktuella tillstånd.
